channel.title: Silabs Client Just Crashes
channel.description:
Hi,
Before you post do not say "Try uver sevr cuz it cud be da serva" because I have tried loads of servers (even with silabs enabled)
When I start the server it says "Welcome to servername, there are now <players> players online..." or something like that but the screen stays black with the text "loading, please wait..." and then the whole client just crashes?!!?
im using silabs client v5 @ http://client.silabsoft.org
- toon

item.title: Silabs Client Just Crashes
item.dc:creator: @_ara72421 §ara72421
item.description:
@_ara72421 wrote:

the reason is

  1. Eaither there is to many ppl
  2. The client is not done yet still has bugs
  3. go to server stats and look for one that has a .biz and try that
  4. if .biz dont work try a full ip like 0.0.0.0.0.0.0 (replace the 0 with the ip given)

Hope It Helps!

Read full topic
